codebase.description: A CLI tool to read Hacker News stories.

prompts.prompt: Implement a background fetching feature for comments given the time interval.
prompts.issue_comment: The `sed` bash commands are not working for each model.

prompts.prompt: Please return the code you used to continuesly fetch comments given the time interval in a code block.
prompts.issue_comment: Both models returned a code without the file to put the code.

prompts.prompt: Please return the code along with the file to put the code in.
prompts.issue_comment: There is no way of knowing that the comments are being refetched. A progress indicator is needed.

prompts.prompt: There is no way of knowing that the comments are being refetched. A progress indicator is needed.
prompts.comment: Now the issue is fixed by both models. The progress indicator is shown in the terminal when the comments are being refetched.

prompts.prompt: Now add a feature to refetch comments for ASK stories in the background.
prompts.comment: Now the issue is fixed by both models. The progress indicator is shown in the terminal when the comments are being refetched.
